roi_feature_map:
{
  "resolving_features": [
    "Digital Adoption Platform",
    "In-app Guidance",
    "Analytics",
    "Simulated Training",
    "Application Analytics",
    "Customized Pricing",
    "Dedicated Customer Success Team",
    "Ongoing Support and Training"
  ],
  "details": "Whatfix's digital adoption platform provides a return on investment for Marks and Spencer by addressing their digital transformation and adoption struggles. The platform's in-app guidance feature provides personalized onboarding experiences for employees and customers, reducing the time and resources wasted on manual processes and guides. The analytics capabilities track user behavior and adoption, allowing Marks and Spencer to identify areas of improvement and optimize their software applications. The simulated training feature enhances employee training, leading to improved software adoption and reduced energy consumption. The application analytics provide insights into user behavior and software adoption, helping Marks and Spencer to make data-driven decisions. The customized pricing plans ensure that the solution is scalable and affordable for Marks and Spencer's large-scale business. The dedicated customer success team and ongoing support and training ensure a smooth implementation and onboarding process, minimizing downtime and maximizing ROI."
}
